name: Bounty Train
description: Explore the dangerous life, the accurate historic events and contemporary inventions of the North American/US 19th century. Acquire one of the most legendary steam machines and transform it into a fortress on rails.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6570, GeForce 9600 GT or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 (32/64 bit versions), Windows 10 Processor: 2.8 GHz Multi Core CPU Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6570, GeForce 9600 GT or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
